  • Factoring Polynomials with SymPy
  • View page source

Factoring Polynomials with SymPyÂ¶

Here is an example that uses SymPy to factor polynomials.

In [1]:

from ipywidgets import interact

In [2]:

from sympy import Symbol, Eq, factor

In [3]:

x = Symbol('x')

In [4]:

def factorit(n):
    return Eq(x**n-1, factor(x**n-1))

In [5]:

factorit(12)

Out[5]:

Eq(x**12 - 1, (x - 1)*(x + 1)*(x**2 + 1)*(x**2 - x + 1)*(x**2 + x + 1)*(x**4 - x**2 + 1))

In [6]:

interact(factorit, n=(2,40));
